website_summaries.verdict: There's a reason this is the premier brand in taking care of babies and toddlers – nothing cleans as gently as this soap- and alcohol-free shampoo.
pros: Cost effective and safe for the little one's eyes as well as hair
Adults have also found it a great alternative to harsher shampoos
cons: Some feel it's a bit too sudsy
Thicker hair may still need an extra detangler

If you have thin or straight hair this would probably be really good.

product_meta.title: Johnson's No More Tangles Extra Conditioning Shampoo & Detangler, 18 Fl. Oz. (Pack of 2)
product_meta.description: Cleanse and help prevent tangles in one step with Johnson's No More Tangles Extra Conditioning Shampoo. Designed for babies' delicate hair, this conditioning shampoo cleans hair and scalp, and gently detangles to prevent knots and snarls. The dermatologist-tested shampoo features Johnson's No More Tears formula, which means it's as gentle to the eyes as pure water. This allergy-tested shampoo is soap- and alcohol-free and hypoallergenic.
